short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build to enchance the users experiance and enable them to find realstate properties in a better way

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enriches the information on sites based on MelkRadar API, like adding extra information on Divar and Sheypoor websites using the integration with some the MelkRadar features like bookmarking.
These features helps the real-estate agents to collaborate together and share their activities together.
It also helps developers understand what happens under the roof.
